name: Wipe Out VR
description: Q-style VR tower defense strategy game. By simulating the true feeling of archery, you can choose single person mode or multiple cooperation mode to guard your castle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD FX-6100 | or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 700 series | AMD Radeon HD 7770 | or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350 | or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 | AMD Radeon R9 290 | or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
